items.sentence: I'll do that tomorrow unless something unexpected turns up.
What makes you think that Tom would do something like that?
What's something that you don't get tired of talking about?
I was born and raised in a small village not far from here.
French is the only foreign language that I've ever studied.
When I saw Mary the other day, she was wearing a red dress.
How were you able to convince Tom to make you one of those?
Tom said he didn't care who did it, as long as it got done.
Tom was a creative child, but he's not so creative anymore.
I don't think that Tom would be willing to help us do that.
